background.title: Journey
points:
I've always been curious about how people think, decide, and behave.
That curiosity is what eventually led me toward problem-solving and systems.

At IIT, I started seeing patterns — in code, systems, and behaviour.
Tech became less about coding and more about how things work together.

I realised my work sits between people, product, and engineering.
I enjoy building where technology supports real-world decisions.

items.description:
Built foundations in systems, scalability, and first-principles problem-solving.
Learned to break complexity into clear, actionable decisions.

Shifted from building features to designing outcomes, loops, and impact.
Connected user insight → product decisions → business value.

Built cost-optimised, reliable backend systems — caching, Redis pipelines, infra optimisation.
Improved performance and reduced cloud costs while keeping systems compliant and stable.

Co-led platform architecture and built a proposal engine reducing manual effort ~25%.
Worked across engineering and product, contributing to delivery and roadmap decisions.

Designed Rivo OS end-to-end — the workflow layer powering UAE mortgage journeys.
Simplified onboarding and decision steps using user research + data-driven iteration.
